main event: A very large, heart shaped object, burnished copper in color with a light under it was sighted 30 to 40 degrees above the horizon to the North.
interesting points: The observation lasted for one hour., The sighting was made with a 15x scope and ground-radar., The object was described as heart-shaped and burnished copper in color., There is a possibility that the sighting was related to a weather balloon released from Bridgeport, Connecticut Airport., The witness was a Mrs. [REDACTED] from Bard College, Annandale-on-Hudson, New York.
sighted object: a very large heart-shaped object with a light under it
witness description: Mrs. [REDACTED], Bard College, Annandale-on-Hudson, New York
